meanings.definition: A person who dislikes, despises, or is strongly prejudiced against men.
meanings.sent1: Some misandrists believe that all men are inherently bad.
meanings.sent2: The misandrists in the group refused to listen to any male opinions.
meanings.sent3: The misandrists at the meeting rolled their eyes whenever a man spoke.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the misandrists were portrayed as villains who plotted against the male protagonist.
meanings.sent5: The misandrists' club had strict rules against allowing men to join.
